title: Local Adelaide Team looking for top laner/ADC
body:
Hi there,
In preparation for upcoming LAN events in the Adelaide area, we currently have a team looking for a top laner or ADC. Our ranks consist of Golds+Plats, so we're looking for someone around our ranks.
Ideally someone over the age of 18 and able to be active for team games during the upcoming weeks before events.

If you think you fit this role, feel free to drop me a private message.
